00028 #include "AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 #ifdef CHASTE_CVODE
00032 CvodeAdaptor AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel::msSolver;
00033 #else
00034 RungeKutta4IvpOdeSolver AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel::msSolver;
00035 #endif //CHASTE_CVODE
00036 
00037 
00038 AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel::AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel()
00039 {
00040 #ifdef CHASTE_CVODE
00041     // Chaste solvers always check for stopping events, CVODE needs to be instructed to do so.
00042     msSolver.CheckForStoppingEvents();
00043     msSolver.SetMaxSteps(10000);
00044     //msSolver.SetTolerances(1e-6, 1e-8);
00045 #endif //CHASTE_CVODE
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 double AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel::GetOdeStopTime()
00050 {
00051     assert(msSolver.StoppingEventOccurred());
00052     return msSolver.GetStoppingTime();
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 void AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision()
00057 {
00058     AbstractOdeBasedCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision();
00059 
00060     assert(mpOdeSystem!=NULL);
00061 
00062     // This model needs the protein concentrations and phase resetting to G0/G1.
00063     // Keep the Wnt pathway in the same state but reset the cell cycle part
00064     // Cell cycle is proteins 0 to 4 (first 5 ODEs)
00065     std::vector<double> init_conds = mpOdeSystem->GetInitialConditions();
00066     for (unsigned i=0; i<5; i++)
00067     {
00068        mpOdeSystem->rGetStateVariables()[i] = init_conds[i];
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 void AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel::UpdateCellType()
00074 {
00075     assert(mpOdeSystem!=NULL);
00076     assert(mpCell!=NULL);
00077     if (SimulationTime::Instance()->GetTime() > mLastTime)
00078     {
00079         EXCEPTION("WntCellCycleModel::UpdateCellType() should only be called when the cell cycle model has been evaluated to the current time\n");
00080     }
00081     ChangeCellTypeDueToCurrentBetaCateninLevel();
00082 }
